name: Sudoku Puzzle Edition
description:
Sudoku Puzzle Edition is a game you fill in the blanks using numbers 1 to 9 without duplication in row, column, and box (3x3).
Sudoku Puzzle Edition on mobile is good as playing with a pencil and paper.

[Game Features]
- Highlights all matching numbers
- Four difficulty levels
- Total of 8000 stages
- Undo function
- Hints
- Pencil marks function
- Game center achievements
- Leaderboards
